data.title: QA Higher Education
data.meta_description: Welcome to the QA's Higher Education website. Learn more about the different courses we offer and the partner universities we work with.
data.text:
If we want anything or if there's anything I don't understand, I always feel comfortable asking for help.

My English language teacher Jenny, always makes her classes entertaining. The university really helps with the learning process, and makes sure that we are up to date with parts of our study we may have fallen behind on. My class is full of a range of people and a lot of people from my country who I can relate to.

Khalid Aljimy

International Foundation Programme - Engineering

Technology is fast growing and I wanted to be up-to-date with the tools to work in this field, as many companies are using digital marketing instead of traditional marketing methods

For me, when I completed my undergraduate degree in Business Administration, I started working in a visa consultation firm and I realised they were using a lot of digital methods to connect with and retain their customers.

Vidhi Vadodaria

MSc Digital Marketing with Advanced Practice

I have always found business very interesting. Even when I was younger I used to read magazines that were about business.

I joined this course because I want to gain knowledge and skills that I can use to help my parents when I go back to China after graduation.

Shunan Liu

BA (Hons) Business (Top Up)

My best experience so far is how welcoming the university is to international students.

They threw a welcome party and the teaching techniques here are very understandable.

Tenu Evans

International Foundation Programme

The foundation programme really helped me with my English and other academic aspects such as referencing and summarising. I've learnt to use words that I wouldn't normally use.

You do get more comfortable with the English language and the foundation programme does help.

Soad Lajud

International Foundation Programme - Art, Design and Media
